_header: Might wisdom goodness of the Trinity / My naked soul…
Subjects: hymns, to Virgin Mary; Virgin Mary, hymns to
_description: Hymn to the Virgin Mary — twenty three 8-line stanzas with refrain: ‘O florum flos O flos pulcherime’

BLHar3869.First Lines: Myght wisdom goodnesse of the TriniteMi naked sowle inspire with influence…
BLHar3869.Last Lines: …Knelyng pay said we make þe homageO florum flos O flos pulcherime
BLHar3869.Note: Longer version of 23 stanzas, begins single column but changes to double columns on f. 367.
BLHar3869.Facsimiles:
Digital Facsimile of British Library Harley MS 3869.
         https://www.bl.uk/manuscripts/FullDisplay.aspx?index=0&ref=Harley_MS_38690.

BLAdd31042.First Lines: …With humble hert I praye iche creaturelorde & lady knyghte and othere fferialle…
BLAdd31042.Last Lines: …Thi heghe bewte & to synge with hert myldeO fflorum flos O fflos Pulcherime
BLAdd31042.Note: Lacks first stanza. Ends, “Amen. Explicit Cantus Amen” (f. 81vb).
BLAdd31042.Editions:
MacCracken,  Henry Noble. 
             “Lydgatiana.” 
             Archiv für das Studium der neueren Sprachen und
                Literaturen
         131 (1913): 40-63: 60-3.
